WithDefaultValue:
import { useState } from 'react'
import { Slider } from '@ark-ui/react'

const WithDefaultValue = () => (
  <Slider.Root min={-50} max={50} defaultValue={42}>
    <Slider.Control>
      <Slider.Track>
        <Slider.Range />
      </Slider.Track>
      <Slider.Thumb />
    </Slider.Control>
  </Slider.Root>
)
